name: Retro Railgun Lacrosse Shaft
description: Introducing the 'Retro Railgun' from Haute Stick Lacrosse Three years in the making, the "Retro Railgun" is a backwards jump in lacrosse shaft technology. The Retro Railgun is designed for those lacrosse players that love the solid feel of wood, but want the strength of more modern shafts. This shaft is the second hybrid shaft designed by Haute Stick, and continues the winning tradition of innovative lacrosse gear. Just like the Titanium Railgun, the Retro is not just another tube; It's a complete redesign of the shaft itself. As you can see, The Retro gives you the solid, impact dampening feel of wood, but with the lighter weight of aluminum alloys. This Hybrid Wood and Metal Shaft is one of the strongest shafts created out of wood. It is completely unlike anything you have ever seen before, and it will feel insane in your hand. Retro The Retro is built out of two twin rails of specially treated hardwood that is elastomerically bonded with a special high strength adhesive that never hardens like most brittle glues. The special rubberized elastomer helps to absorb impact shock and spread the vibration through to the high-strength aluminum spine. Through the integration of the elastomeric adhesive and the high strength Alloy tube, the whole shaft acts as a shock absorbing structure and can take hits that would dent even more expensive metal shafts. In fact, this special glue is so exotic it costs over $260 dollars per gallon! Click Here for more information All this technology is available at a very special price through our internet only special offer. Get the Retro for a special internet price through our Factory Outlet for only $29.99 plus S&H. For any other questions e-mail us now.

name: Disco Derby
description:
The Haute Stick Disco Derby

This is the most comfortable, form fitting hat in the universe. (ok, maybe there are better ones on Mars)

- Low Crown with contrasting cover stitch
- 100% Cotton
- No stiff buckram on the crown
- Adjustable Plastic Tightening Strap

Handmade in Orange County, California in the good ol' U.S. of A.

Colors Available
Black | Khaki | Navy |

name: Stick Sheath
description:
The Stick Sheath was designed make it easier to haul around your stuff. Use it with just your stick, or thread the gearstrap through your gloves and helmet. 

Features:
* Fits any size shaft
* Constructed with durable 600 denier Polyester with PVC backing
* Large Heavy duty hanging hook
* Adjustable equipment strap for hanging and securing lacrosse gear such as helmet, gloves and shoes
* Comfort-grip carrying handle
* Large shoulder strap
* Size 24" x 2" x 2"
* Colors available: Black with red print or black with red print

name: Mutant Shaft
description:
One of the stongest shafts ever designed.

The Mutant is also the first Hybrid Lacrosse Shaft ever made.

It combines the low-weight of Alloys and the High Strength of Composite. The shaft is composed of a high strength aluminium alloy, overwrapped with a lightweight Kevlar Impact Layer. The Kevlar Impact layer acts as a hard armor shell that protects the lighter Alloy core from impact damage.

This stick is designed for the player that likes to check, and check hard. 

This shaft, like all our Shafts are Built Tough in Orange County California.
